Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery wine-jar, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and very faint traces of one line of black-painted hieratic text.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amarna, el-, TA:30-31 House T36.51 I.17
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393606) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393606)
